title: Sash, 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic threads
Technique: woven
description: Panel woven entirely with gold threads and additional colors of red, purple and green showing an allover geometric tree pattern. Border, parallel to selvage, has flowers. Both ends of the panel setoff by a wide border showing floral groups. Gold fringe.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sash, 19th century.Medium: silk, metallic threads
Technique: woven. 1961-115-41.
